name: Hexageddon
description:
Hexageddon

This is a personal project started off of a Unity 2D course, but I added my personal changes.

Disclaimer: Android build has an Input bug and sometimes it is not processed properly, which can cause gameplay issues.

Game has 4 levels right now. You have a total of 6 lives to pass them before you lose.

Controls: 

  • Movement: WASD or arrow keys
  • Shoting: Spacebar, right click
  • Pause: P

Controller support is available.

Future updates:

  • Fix input for mobile
  • More levels
  • Level selection UI
  • Scoring
  • Level transitions

If you liked the game, and/or have any comments, please tell me!
